response.original_title: My Transgender Life: Paul Wears Dresses
response.overview: Follows the struggles of Stefonknee Wolscht, a trans woman trying to rebuild her life. Losing her home and her family, Stefonknee gives a first hand account of the many challenges trans people face. In her hometown, Stefonknee was known as a loving husband and father, a really good mechanic and a staunch Catholic but only she knew the truth; that she had been assigned to the wrong gender.
response.tagline: What It's Like to be Transgender & Transition to a Different Sex
response.title: My Transgender Life: Paul Wears Dresses
